mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} , modified_Time = systimestamp, media = #{media} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, b.name as clubType, a.title, c.nickname as author, a.views, a.likes, a.created_time, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM comments d WHERE d.post_id = a.id AND d.selection = 1) THEN '해결 완료' ELSE '해결 중' END AS selection FROM posts a JOIN clubs b ON a.club_type = b.id JOIN users c ON a.author = c.userid ORDER BY a.id

SELECT a.id, b.name as clubType, a.title, c.nickname as author, a.views, a.likes, a.created_time, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM comments d WHERE d.post_id = a.id AND d.selection = 1 ) THEN '해결 완료' ELSE '해결 중' END AS selection FROM posts a JOIN clubs b ON a.club_type = b.id JOIN users c ON a.author = c.userid WHERE c.userid = #{userid} ORDER BY a.id

SELECT a.id, b.name AS clubType, a.title, c.nickname AS author, a.views, a.likes, a.created_time, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM comments d WHERE d.post_id = a.id AND d.selection = 1) THEN '해결 완료' ELSE '해결 중' END AS selection FROM posts a JOIN clubs b ON a.club_type = b.id JOIN users c ON a.author = c.userid
AND a.club_type = 'WG'
AND a.club_type = 'PT'
AND a.club_type = 'UT'
AND a.club_type = 'WD'
AND a.club_type = 'DR'
AND a.club_type = 'IR'

AND upper(a.content) like upper(#{searchKeyword})
AND (upper(a.title) like upper(#{searchKeyword}) OR upper(a.content) like upper(#{searchKeyword}))
AND upper(c.nickname) like upper(#{searchKeyword})
ORDER BY a.id DESC
